languages.text: "Слава Всеотцу!" {n}Голос Ульфара грохочет над толпой. Воодушевленные силой его веры — люди славят Императора, осеняя себя аквилой и провозглашая Имя Его до хрипоты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Слава Всеотцу!" {n}Голос Ульфара грохочет над толпой. Воодушевленные силой его веры — люди славят Императора, осеняя себя аквилой и провозглашая Имя Его до хрипоты.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слава Всеотцу!" {n}Голос Ульфара грохочет над толпой. Воодушевленные силой его веры — люди славят Императора, осеняя себя аквилой и провозглашая Имя Его до хрипоты.{/n}

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei der Allvater!" {n}Ulfars Stimme dröhnt über die Menge. Inspiriert von der Kraft seines Glaubens, preisen die Menschen den Imperator und verkünden seinen Namen, bis sie heiser sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei der Allvater!" {n}Ulfars Stimme dröhnt über die Menge. Inspiriert von der Kraft seines Glaubens, preisen die Menschen den Imperator und verkünden seinen Namen, bis sie heiser sind.{/n}

languages.text: « Gloire au Père de tout ! » {n}La voix d'Ulfar résonne dans la foule. Encouragé par sa ferveur, la foule acclame l'Empereur, criant Son nom jusqu'à perdre le souffle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Gloire au Père de tout ! » {n}La voix d'Ulfar résonne dans la foule. Encouragé par sa ferveur, la foule acclame l'Empereur, criant Son nom jusqu'à perdre le souffle.{/n}

languages.text: “荣耀归于全父！”{n}乌尔法高喊起来，声音震耳欲聋。在他的信仰与力量的鼓舞下，所有人赞美起了帝皇，高声呼喊祂的名字，直到嗓子喊哑为止。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “荣耀归于全父！”{n}乌尔法高喊起来，声音震耳欲聋。在他的信仰与力量的鼓舞下，所有人赞美起了帝皇，高声呼喊祂的名字，直到嗓子喊哑为止。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Gloria al Padre de Todo!». {n}La voz de Ulfar resuena entre la multitud. Inspirada por la fuerza de su fe, la gente alaba al Emperador, gritando Su nombre hasta quedarse ronca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Gloria al Padre de Todo!». {n}La voz de Ulfar resuena entre la multitud. Inspirada por la fuerza de su fe, la gente alaba al Emperador, gritando Su nombre hasta quedarse ronca.{/n}

languages.text: 「全知の父に栄光あれ！」{n}ウルファーの声が群衆に向かって轟いた。信仰の力に鼓舞された人々は皇帝を称え、その名を叫び続け、声がかれるまで賛美した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「全知の父に栄光あれ！」{n}ウルファーの声が群衆に向かって轟いた。信仰の力に鼓舞された人々は皇帝を称え、その名を叫び続け、声がかれるまで賛美した。{/n}

languages.text: "Yücebaba çok yaşa!" {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, kalabalığın üzerinde gürlüyor. İnancının kudretinden ilham alan insanlar, sesleri kısılana kadar İmparator'u överek O'nun adını haykırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Allfather!" {n}Ulfar's voice thunders over the crowd. Inspired by the might of his faith, the people praise the Emperor, shouting His name until their voices become hoarse.{/n}
